com.esri.mo2.data.qb
Interface PreParser

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasePreParser
public interface PreParser

The classes that implement this interface can be used to preparse a where-clause via the QueryEnvironment's preparse method. Table implementations may need this. for example, when receiving an attribute query for the search method. Usually, the where-clause supplied will contain macros that need to be expanded into the format required by the particular Table.

See Also:
QueryEnvironment.preparse(java.lang.String)

Method Summary
 String substitute(String name, String value)
          When a macro is detected, QueryEnvironment's preparse method will call this method to request an appropiate substitution.
 

Method Detail

substitute

public String substitute(String name,
                         String value)
                  throws ParseException
When a macro is detected, QueryEnvironment's preparse method will call this method to request an appropiate substitution.

Parameters:
name - the macro name, e.g. ts for time-stamp
value - the macro value, e.g. if the macro is {ts 'xxx'} then "xxx" is the value
Returns:
the substitution value if possible, or throws an exception
Throws:
ParseException - if the macro value cannot be parsed
